betterquesting:10.desc:8: §9Note:§r This pack uses §5Fluix Crystals§r generated as a GT material rather than the default AE2 Fluix Crystals. To get them, put §dFluix Dust§r in the §aAutoclave§r, which is made from §7Certus Quartz Dust§r, §eNether Quartz Dust§o§r and §cRedstone§r in a §aMixer§r. No need to charge the Certus Quartz. It gets charged in the Mixer... or something.
